extension_description.message: An AI Web Page Summarization Extension

common_default_prompt.message: Please read what I send you and return a concise, short and well-organized summary of the content. No matter what I send you, please answer in English.

common_components_pagination_input_descr.message: Enter the page number you wish to jump to here

notification_error_api_key_missing.message: Please add your API Key first

error_summary_in_forbidden_url.message: Summary cannot be triggered on the current tab's URL

sidepanel_nav_setting_switch_description.message: A button to open or close the panel, which includes buttons to navigate to the options page, disable summaries in the current tab url, and change the theme color

sidepanel_nav_forbidden_url_title.message: Disable summaries on the current page URL

sidepanel_nav_forbidden_url_confirm_deta.message: Do you confirm that you want to disable summaries on the current URL $1?

sidepanel_nav_forbidden_url_confirm_erro.message: The current tab URL is empty

sidepanel_nav_update_theme_panel_descrip.message: Click to switch the theme color on the color panel

sidepanel_welcome_info.message: After the tab has finished loading, click the icon to start

sidepanel_welcome_logo_title.message: Click to start summarizing the webpage content

sidepanel_welcome_logo_description.message: Summarizer icon, its color will change with the theme color

sidepanel_chat_summary_description.message: This chat is a summary of the webpage content

sidepanel_chat_action_description.message: Action area for the current conversation

sidepanel_chat_action_download_menu_titl.message: Download summary menu, includes exporting as txt, markdown, png filetype

options_import_info_finished.message: Imported $1, $2 did not meet the requirements

options_form_response_type_tips_stream.message: Stream format to get AI responses in parts (faster response)

options_form_response_type_tips_json.message: JSON format to get the entire AI response at once

options_form_response_type_description.message: Click to switch the AI response type

options_form_summary_prompt_tips.message: Good summaries come from good prompts

options_form_summary_prompt_description.message: Click to open the AI summary prompt detail dialog and edit

options_form_filter_tips.message: Can replace information in the webpage that you do not want the AI to know

options_form_filter_description.message: Click to open the sensitive information detail drawer and edit

options_form_forbidden_url_tips.message: Write down the URLs where you do not want to use this plugin to avoid accidental triggering

options_form_forbidden_url_description.message: Click to open the disabled URLs detail drawer adn edit

options_form_gemini_api_key_tips.message: The Gemini API Key is used for interface authentication.

options_form_gemini_api_key_description.message: Click to open the Gemini API Key detail box and edit

options_form_advanced_rule_tips.message: Special URLs require specific web content retrieval functions

options_form_advanced_rule_description.message: Click to open the web content detail drawer and edit

options_form_theme_description.message: Click to display the color panel and change the theme's base color

options_form_header_icon_description.message: Settings Icon, used as the header

options_forbidden_url_tips.message: Starting with R: to be treated as a regex

options_filter_sensitive_tips.message: Information that needs to be replaced

options_filter_replacement_tips.message: If empty it will be replaced with * symbols

options_advanced_rule_url_tips.message: Please fill in the URL where the function applies, starting with R: is considered a regex

options_advanced_rule_js_title.message: Please fill in your function to get webpage content below, for function examples and requirements, go to

options_advanced_rule_js_action_descript.message: Jump to external link to learn about function writing rules

options_forbidden_url_remove_detail.message: Do you want to delete the URL $1 ?

options_filter_remove_detail.message: Do you want to delete the replacement of $1?

options_advanced_rule_remove_detail.message: Do you want to delete the content acquisition rule for $1?
